alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Owen (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:48PM EDT until June 25 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Carroll County in northern Kentucky... Owen County in northern Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 647 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Carrollton, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Owenton, Sanders, Corinth, Worthville, Monterey, Gratz, Elk Lake, Beechwood, Harmony, Interstate 71 at Mile Marker 52, Long Ridge, Wheatley, Natlee, New Liberty, Squiresville, Eagle Station, New Columbus and Elmer Davis Lake. This includes I-71 in Kentucky between mile markers 48 and 52. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern Kentucky. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM EDT for northern Kentucky.
